Contact details

Anyone who is interested in the contents of these articles is welcome to write to me at my email address. Please quote the name of the website, and relevant article in the subject line, for example: 

Subject: Pearls of Wisdom - Faith in God

I will appreciate any suggestions to improve the content or the format of this website. Your contributions are, of course, also welcome. The Pearls of Wisdom website is dedicated to the body of Christ for their spiritual growth and edification.

May the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you.

Francois van der Hoven
email: francoisvdhoven@protonmail.com

I am a member of HeartLife Church in Narangba. Click here to visit the HeartLife Church website.
